title: Help with this font??
content:
Can anyone here help with this distressed or grunge style font. I think the font it self is helvetica bold. Maby someone knows of this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060242im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/atx%20series_3946.jpg)

 [‹ From Einaudi 1945](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060242/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41673 "Go to previous forum topic") [Intersport Logo - 'SPORT' Font used? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060242/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41737 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JimC

comments.content: I think the grunge texture was applied after.

You’re probably right about the font being Helvetica. Perhaps they just dirtied it up a bit. See this thread :

[http://typophile.com/node/41559](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060242/http:/typophile.com/node/41559 "http://typophile.com/node/41559")
